title: Saving Host and IP separately
author: PVC-C
body_snippet:
This Tool is sent from Heaven.
My Productivity increased greatly, but I’d like to ask for an additional Feature:

Saving the IP in a Field „IP“.
Saving the Hostname in a Field „Hostname“
And a Way to set the Primary.


Really fantastic would be a Check if they match at the Moment of the Connection Attempt.


Reason:
We have a lot of Machines scattered around different Customers and sometimes the Hostname won’t resolve, but the Hostname would be really useful.
At the Moment I put it ...
